error.message: Call to deprecated method l() of class Drupal. Deprecated in drupal:8.0.0 and is removed from drupal:9.0.0. Use \Drupal\Core\Link::fromTextAndUrl() instead.
Call to deprecated method l() of class Drupal. Deprecated in drupal:8.0.0 and is removed from drupal:9.0.0. Use \Drupal\Core\Link::fromTextAndUrl() instead.
Call to deprecated method l() of class Drupal. Deprecated in drupal:8.0.0 and is removed from drupal:9.0.0. Use \Drupal\Core\Link::fromTextAndUrl() instead.
Add core_version_requirement: ^8 || ^9 to yoast_seo.info.yml to designate that the module is compatible with Drupal 9. See https://drupal.org/node/3070687.
The drupal/core requirement is not Drupal 9 compatible. Either remove it or update it to be compatible with Drupal 9. See https://drupal.org/node/2514612#s-drupal-9-compatibility.
